sect1.title: Intshayelelo
sect1.para: Wamkelekile kwi-Ubuntu &distro-rev; &distro-version;! Eli nqakwana licacisa ezinye kwiimpawu ezintsha nophuculo olunikezwa koku kukhutshwa, kwakunye nabanikeli bokuqala. Okudityanisiweyo ngamanqakwana awodwa ophuculo asuka kukukhutshwa kwangaphambili kwe-Ubuntu.

sect1.title: Yintoni eNtsha
sect1.para: I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; &distro-version; inikezela ezi mpawu zintsha zilandelayo nophuculo:

listitem.para: I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; iquka ukukhutshwa kwe-2.10 lwe-GNOME desktop. Xa ufuna ulwazi olulolunye, jonga i-website GNOME.

I-K Desktop Environment ye-Ubuntu (Kubuntu) ngoku iyafumaneka. Abaphuhlisi be-kubuntu bayile indawo emanyaniswe ngokufanelekileyo kwi-KDE desktop nokuzinza kunye nokuthembeka kondoqo we-Ubuntu. Le desktop ikhawulezileyo, nemelwe ngokwaneleyo akululanga nje ukuyilawula koko ikwagcwaliswe ngeenkqubo eziluncedo kunye nezinto ezinomtsalane emehlweni.

I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; iquka iseva ye-X esuka kwi-X.org. Amakhadi evidiyo kubathengisi abaninzi nabaphambili bevidiyo ngoku bayaxhaswa. Ukucinywa okuphuculweyo okuzenzekelayo kuvumela phantsi ukufunyanwa kwekhadi levidiyo jikelele. Kukwakho nolwandiso lwemisebenzi emikhulu kwii-ATI drivers ezisemgangathweni neziyimfanelo, neze-Nvidia drivers. Xa ufuna ulwazi olulolunye, jonga kwi-website X.org.

I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; iquka imiqulu emibini emitsha ekunceda ukuba ugcine ikhompyutha yakho ihlale ihlaziyekile: i-update-manager ne-upgrade-notifier. UMlawuli womqulu we-Synaptic nawo uquka inkxaso yokuphucula uSasazo lwakho lwe-Ubuntu.

i-update-manager ngumqulu okuvumela ukuba uphucule ngokukhawuleza nangempumelelo i-software yakho ngasemva. Inkqubo ilula kodwa ngaphandle kokuchubekileyo okhetha kuko nokunikezwa ngumlawuli womqulu we-Synaptic. Umqulu olungileyo kubantu abathanda izinto ezilula njengokucofa kanye kuphuculo, nokufanayo noko kufumaneka kwezinye iinkqubo ezisebenzayo.
i-upgrade-notifier ivumela abasebenzisi ukuba bafumane izaziso zokuba uhlaziyo luyafumaneka, kwakunye nokubakhumbuza ukuba bagcine ikhompyutha yabo ihlaziyiwe.

I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; ibone iQela lamaXwebhu le-Ubuntu lisenza iSikhokelo esaziwa njenge-Ubuntu FAQ Guide, i-Ubuntu Quick Guide, namanye amaxwebhu achaza ukuba i-Ubuntu yintoni na kunye neempawu/imisebenzi ekhoyo kukhutsho lwangoku.

ISikhokelo se-Ubuntu FAQ sijolise ekuphenduleni eyona mibuzo ebuzwa rhoqo ngabasebenzisi. ISikhokelo se-Ubuntu yintshayelelo ye-Ubuntu Desktop, echaza i-GNOME Desktop nemisebenzi/neenkqubo ezifumanekayo kufakelo olusemgangathweni.
I-Readahead ikhawulezisa inkqubo ye-boot ngokukopa ulwazi kwidiski ukuya kwimemori ngaphambi kokuba lufuneke, ikwathatha ithuba elivelayo kubume obungazinzanga kulandelelwano lwe-boot.

I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; inenkqubo ekhawulezayo ye-boot. Kwenziwe uphuculo kuqaliso lweseva ye-X, i-GNOME Display Manager (GDM) nenkqubo yoshicilelo ye-CUPS. Inkqubo ye-hotplug, nevumela abasebenzisi ukuba "hot-swap" USB, IEEE 1394/izixhobo ze-Firewire, ezinye izixhobo ezikhuphekayo, nezingakhuphekiyo ezinjengamakhadi e-PCI, ngoku zisebenzisa i-grepmap ukwenza inkqubo ye-boot ikhawuleze.
i-grepmap isetyenziselwa ukuphucula isantya senkqubo ye-hotplug, nevumela ukuba wenze i-'hot-swap' kwizixhobo ezinjenge-USB ne-IEEE 1394/firewire devices.

I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; inikezela inkxaso ekumiseni ii-laptop kwi-RAM (kwimo elindileyo) nokumisa idiski (kwimo ye-hibernate). Olu phawu lungangasebenzi ngokumiselweyo ngokuxhomekeka kulwakhiwo lwekhompyutha.

I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; inikezela inkxaso yokunqumamisa kwidiski. Olu phawu luyavulwa xa lufumaneka, ngumseki-zixhobo. Ukuba uphucula ukusuka kwi-Ubuntu 4.10, nceda udibane namaNqaku oPhuculo ukuze ufumane ulwazi olulolunye.

I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; ixhasa i-Processor Frequency Scaling, uphawu oluhlenga-hlengisa isantya se-CPU ekuhlangabezeni ubango olukhoyo. Isiphumo ngumthwalo oncitshisiweyo kwibhetri ye-laptop kunye nemveliso yobushushu encinci. Inkxaso ezenzekelayo ye-driver ngoku iyafumaneka kuluhlu olubanzi lwe-hardware.
I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; iquka iseva ye-X esuka kwi-X.org. Xa ufuna ulwazi olulolunye, jonga kwi-website X.org.

I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; iquka inkxaso yokwenza uluhlu lolwazi nge-hardware ngokunxulumene nomiselo lwenkqubo/nofakelo kwakunye nokulandela umkhondo wobubanzi benkxaso ye-Ubuntu kwi-hardware. Olona phawu luphambili lwedatabase ye-hardware kukukwazi koluntu ukuba negalelo kulwazi oluya kuncedisa iqela lophuhliso ekuphuculeni inkxaso ye-Ubuntu kwi-hardware yabo.

I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; iqalisa i-Kickstart compatibility ukuze umlawuli wenkqubo akwazi ukuchaza ufakelo lwee-parameter kanye, aze afake i-Ubuntu kwinani loomatshini ngokugqitha kwi-CD-ROM, local hard drive, NFS, FTP, okanye HTTP.

I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; ngoku inenkqubo edityanisiweyo yokufumana i-hardware. I-Live CD, isifaki-zixhobo senkqubo, kunye nenkqubo yoseko-zixhobo zonke zisebenzisa hotplug. Ukuba i-Live CD ifumana ngokuchanekileyo kwaye imisele i-hardware, nesiseki-zixhobo siya kwenza njalo. I-Live CD ngoku ingasetyenziswa kuvavanyo lwe-hardware efanayo phambi kokuba kufakwe i-Ubuntu.

I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; inenkqubo yokhetho i-keyboard layout ephuculweyo. Ngexesha loseko-zixhobo, abasebenzisi akusayi kubakho mfuneko ukuba bazi nantoni na malunga ne-keyboard layout, umiselo oluchanekileyo olumiselweyo, i-xkb layout efanelekileyo, okanye oko kusetyenziswa kulwakhiwo (PS/2, USB). I-keyboard layout ikhethwa xa umsebenzisi ecofe amaqhosha athile.
I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; ngoku ixhasa useko-zixhobo lwezixhobo ze-USB.

I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; ngoku inikezela imifanekiso yoseko-zixhobo olusuka kwi-DVD. I-DVD inoseko-zixhobo lwemifanekiso oluquka yonke imiqulu yenkxaso, ukuquka naleyo iNgenalo useko-zixhobo ngokumiselweyo.

listitem.para: I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; ngoku ithatha zonke izigqibo negalelo labasebenzisi kwinqanam lokuqala lenkqubo yofakelo-zixhobo. Xa sele ulwimi loseko-zixhobo lukhutshiwe, nenkqubo yenziwe kutsha, onke amanqanam alandelayo oseko-zixhobo angazenzekela ngokunokwawo.
I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; ngoku iquka iMowudi yoHlangulo kwinkqubo yoseko-zixhobo ukuvumela ulungiso lwenkqubo nolwakhiwo ngokutsha.

I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; iqalise ngesibonelelo esitsha se-Live CD esivumela i-Live CD kulwakhiwo lulonke lwe-Ubuntu oluxhaswa ngokuseburhulumenteni, uyilo nolwakhiwo olulula nolugcinekayo, kunye nenkqubo emanyaneyo yokubona nemiselweyo ye-hardware.

I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; iqalise imiqulu yolwimi. Ivumela abasebenzisi ukuba baseke izixhobo zolwazi kufikeleleko ngqo kwiNgingqi olusuka kwi-database esembindini njengomqulu omnye, endaweni yenkqubo nganye okanye umqulu ngamnye. Oku kuphucula ugcino lweelwimi/kwingingqi nogcino kwidiski. Oku kukwavumela uguqulo lolwimi ukuba lusuke ngqo kwi-Rosetta.

I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; isebenzisa i-UTF-8 njengonxulumano olumiselweyo nolufikelela ngqo, kwaye luquka ukufana kwemfuduko kuphuculo. I-UTF-8 ivumela inkxaso kwingqokelela yoonobumba bezizwe ngezizwe kumxokelelwano weefayili uwonke kunye neenkqubo.
I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; ivumela i-APT kumqulu ekugcinwa kuwo izinto ezifihlakeleyo neziqinisekisiweyo . Ulawulo loqinisekiso lukwafumaneka kwi-Synaptic.
I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; ixhasa i-Bzip2 yemiqulu ecinezelweyo ye-Debian. Oku kuvumela ugcino lwendawo olubalulekileyo kwimiqulu enemibhalo enzima, kunye nezongezo zemiqulu emincinci.

Kwi-Ubuntu &distro-rev; iinkqubo ezininzi eziqhutywa njengomsebenzi onikwe amandla akhethekileyo (okanye okulinganayo) kwezinye ii-platform/kusasazo, zisebenza njengabasebenzisi abaneemfanelo ezingephi. Okuqukwe kuluhlu ngexesha lokukhutshwa yi-klogd, syslogd, cupsd, hald, ntpd, procmail, smbmount/smbumount, jackd, login, gpg/gnupg, hpoj, ne-at. Oku kuqinisekisa ukuba ukhuseleko kwezi nkqubo alusayi kuphinda luchaphazele inkqubo iyonke, koko kwinkqubo iyodwa.

step.para: Tshintsha indawo ogcina kuyo izinto ukufuna i-Hoary kwimenyu: Imimiselo Indawo ogcina kuyo izinto .
Ukusuka: URI: http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ Distribution: warty Sections: main restricted Iya: http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ Distribution: hoary Sections: main restricted
Faka kwakhona uludwe lwakho loovimba ngokugqitha kwiqhosha Faka kwakhona.
Cofa iqhosha Phawula Lonke uPhuculo elilandelwa liqhosha Sebenzisa.
Hlela uluhlu loovimba bakho: sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list
Tshintsha indawo ogcina kuyo izinto ku-Hoary.
Ukusuka: deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ warty main restricted Ukuya: deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ hoary main restricted
Hlaziya uluhlu loovimba bakho: sudo apt-get update
Phucula yonke imiqulu sudo apt-get dist-upgrade

sect2.title: UPhuculo lwangaPhambili

step.para: Ukuba awusebenzisi i-NFS (Network File System) njengomxhasi okanye iseva, susa umqulu we-portmap: sudo apt-get --purge remove portmap

Kucetyiswa ukuba ufake imiqulu ye-meta ubuntu-base and ubuntu-desktop ukuqinisekisa ukuba unengqokelela iyonke yemiqulu emiyo efakiweyo. Ukungenzi oku kungabangela inkqubo eyophukileyo. sudo apt-get install ubuntu-base ubuntu-desktop

I-Ubuntu &distro-rev; iya kuxhasa inqumamisa kwidiski, kwaye ngexesha loseko-zixhobo iya kumisela inkqubo yakho kulwahlulo lotshintshiselwano. Ukuba uyaphucula, kufuneka uzenzele umiselo ngesandla sokunqumamisa idiski. Ukwenza njalo kufuneka uhlele ifayili (usebenzisa sudo command) /etc/mkinitrd/mkinitrd.conf.

Beka endaweni yomnye umgca #RESUME= ne- RESUME=/dev/SWAP apho i-SWAP kubekwe endaweni yayo ulwahlulo lotshintshiselwano. Ukufumanisa ukuba ulwahlulo lotshintshiselwano ngumyalelo sudo fdisk -l iya kushicilela kwiskrini uluhlu lolwahlulo lwediski enzima. Khangela isixhobo esineleyibhile ethi 'swap.'
Ukuba awunazo izibonelelo zengingqi, ungafumanisa ukuba kubalulekile ukufaka language-pack-xx, language-pack-xx-base and language-support-xx (apho xx iyikhowudi yolwimi lwakho).
Qalisa update-notifier uze ugcine gnome-sessionyakho ukuba ufuna isaziso sohlaziyo esizenzekelayo.
Qala kwakhona ukuze zisebenze zonke iinguqulelo (iinguqulelo ze-Xserver, uphuculo lwe-Kernel, njl-njl).

sect2.para: Ukuphucula kukhutsho lwangaphambili oludala okanye kolunye unikezelo aLuxhaswa, kodwa izimvo zabanye abasebenzisi ngexa baphucula ukukukhutshwa okudala kwe-Ubuntu ne-Debian GNU/Linux kusenziwa amaxwebhu ngokwangoku kwi- Ubuntu Wiki.
